mapper.select: SELECT permissionofcategory.* FROM permissionofcategory WHERE permissionofcategory.permissionId = #{param1} AND permissionofcategory.categoryId = #{param2}

SELECT category.*, teacher.jobNumber FROM permissionofcategory INNER JOIN teacher ON permissionofcategory.permissionId = teacher.permissionId INNER JOIN category ON permissionofcategory.categoryId = category.categoryId WHERE teacher.jobNumber = #{param1}

SELECT category.* FROM permissionofcategory INNER JOIN admin ON permissionofcategory.permissionId = admin.permissionId INNER JOIN category ON permissionofcategory.categoryId = category.categoryId WHERE adminId = #{param1} AND category.categoryId NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT category.parentId FROM category WHERE category.parentId IS NOT NULL )
